title: Drain Pump
description: Universal drain pump ensures efficient and reliable expulsion of water, preventing water logging.

title: Pulsator Baffle
description: Enhances the movement of clothes through water, ensuring a thorough clean by efficiently dislodging dirt.

title: Gearbox
description: Enhances the movement of clothes through water, ensuring a thorough clean by efficiently dislodging dirt.

title: Motor Coupling
description: Connects the motor to the transmission, designed to break under strain to protect the motor and gearbox from damage.

title: Clutch Assembly
description: Facilitates a smooth transition to the spin cycle, preventing wear and ensuring clothes are spun at the right speed for drying.

title: Electronic Control Board
description: The command center of the washing machine, orchestrating each function and cycle for optimal performance.

title: Door interlock
description: Secures the washing machine door during operation, ensuring it remains closed and locked for safety.

title: Thermostat
description: Monitors and regulates the refrigerator's internal temperature, ensuring food is kept at the optimal freshness level.

title: Control Knob
description: Allows precise manual adjustments of the refrigerator's temperature settings, ensuring optimal cooling and freshness levels.

title: Burner
description: Delivers adjustable heat directly to cookware, enabling precise control for a variety of cooking techniques from simmering to boiling.

title: Sealer Gasket
description: Ensures an airtight seal between cooking surfaces, preventing leaks and maintaining consistent cooking temperatures.

title: Heater Element
description: Converts electrical energy into heat, providing consistent and controllable warmth for cooking or baking within appliances.
